# `build-piral`

(tbd)

<!--start:auto-generated-->

Creates a production build for a Piral instance.

## Syntax

```sh
build-piral [source]
```

## Aliases

- bundle-piral
- build-portal
- bundle-portal

## Positionals

### `source`

Sets the source index.html file for collecting all the information.

- Type: `string`
- Default: `./src/index.html`

## Flags

Not applicable.

<!--end:auto-generated-->
